name: Timelapse Flight: Belavia Tupolev Tu-154 Minsk to Geneva
description:
Timelapse full flight from Minsk to Geneva onboard Belavia's Tupolev Tu-154 on 29 May 2015.

**Full flight in real time at 

We turn left after takeoff, getting a great view of the city of Minsk, before heading towards Warsaw, Prague, Stuttgart, Zurich and finally for a beautiful scenic approach along Lake Geneva and landing with full reverse thrust deployed.  ATC is included for approach and landing in Geneva.

Video taken from seat 23F.

Airline:  Belavia
Flight:  B2871
Aircraft:  Tupolev Tu-154 EW-85748
From:  Minsk - National (MSQ)
To:  Geneva (GVA)
Departure:  08:33
Arrival:  09:55
Flight Time:  02:22
Seat:  23F
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/moxNMd

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
